wikitext.*:
'''George Tolkien''' ([[20 October]] [[1784]] - [[1 June]] [[1840]]), son of [[John Benjamin Tolkien (George's father)|John Benjamin Tolkien]] and [[Mary Wall]], was J.R.R. Tolkien's great-grandfather. George was married to [[Eliza Lydia Murrell]] ([[1787]] - [[1863]]). They had eleven children, the second oldest of which, [[John Benjamin Tolkien|John Benjamin]] (1807 - 1896), was the grandfather of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>{{webcite|author=galadhorn|articleurl=http://tolkniety.blogspot.com/2018/01/george-tolkien-178418-not-george-william.html|articlename=George Tolkien (1784–1840) – not George William!|dated=7.1.2018|website=[http://tolkniety.blogspot.com/ Tolknięty]|accessed=20 November 2019}}. – In many sources he is referred as George ''William'' Tolkien, but in all documents his name is George Tolkien. One of his sons was named George William, though.</ref>

George is known to have worked in 1799 as an apprentice to his paternal uncle [[Daniel Tolkien]], the City citizen and a furrier.<ref>{{webcite|author=galadhorn|articleurl=http://tolkniety.blogspot.com/2017/05/john-benjamin-tolkien-1753-1819-summary.html|articlename=John Benjamin Tolkien (1752-1819): a summary|dated=27.3.2018|website=[http://tolkniety.blogspot.com/ Tolknięty]|accessed=20.11.2019}}.</ref>

==Children==
The number and names of George's and Eliza Lydia's children varies in different accounts. Here is a list provided by user galadhorn in Tolknięty:<ref>{{webcite|author=galadhorn|articleurl=http://tolkniety.blogspot.com/2018/01/george-tolkien-178418-not-george-william.html|articlename=George Tolkien (1784–1840) – not George William!|dated=7.1.2018|website=[http://tolkniety.blogspot.com/ Tolknięty]|accessed=20 November 2019}} – see galadhorn's comment (18.2.2018) to the article.</ref>
*[[George William Tolkien]], 1805 - 1877
*[[John Benjamin Tolkien]], 1807 - 1896 ([[Arthur Tolkien|Arthur Tolkien's]] father)
*[[Eliza Tolkien]], 1808 - 1829
*[[William Tolkien|William Murrell Tolkien]], 1810 - 1882
*[[Mary Tolkien|Mary Ann Tolkien]], 1811 - 1864
*[[Henry Tolkien]], 1814 - 1885
*[[Rosina Tolkien|Rosina Susanna Tolkien]], 1819 - 1900
*[[Edward Tolkien]], 1825 - 1911
*[[Ellen Tolkien|Ellen Martha Tolkien]], 1825 - 1848
*[[Septimus Tolkien]], 1826 - 1912
*[[Alfred Tolkien|Alfred John Tolkien]], 1834 - 1867
